description of fullname: Your name may appear around here where you are mentioned. You can change or remove it at any time.
description of location: All of the fields on this page are optional and can be deleted at any time, and by filling them out, you're giving us consent to share this data wherever your user profile appears.
description of username: After changing your username, your old username becomes available for anyone else to claim.
description of delete account: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
description of two factor authen: Two-factor authentication adds an additional layer of security to your account by requiring more than just a password to log in.
description of session: This is a list of devices that have logged into your account. Revoke any sessions that you do not recognize.
description of sercurity alert: Receive security alert notifications via email
checkbox 1: Email each time a vulnerability is found
checkbox 2: Email a digest summary of vulnerability
payment method not added: You have not added a payment method
